Literature.Title: De novo design of selective antibiotic peptides by incorporation of unnatural amino acids.
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Bhonsle JB, Venugopal D, Koser BW, Magill AJ

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides containing unnatural amino acid exhibit potent bactericidal activity against ESKAPE pathogens.
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Abercrombie JJ, Wong RK, Leung KP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=24µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=7.2µg/ml),Mycobacterium fortuitum ATCC 110(MIC=24µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 43223(MIC=2.4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MBC=>100µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii WRAIR13(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii WRAIR13(MBC=25µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae BAMC 07-18(MIC=100µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae BAMC 07-18(MBC=100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=100µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes(MIC=100µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes(MBC=100µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium MMC4(MIC=25µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium MMC4(MBC=50µg/ml),Yersinia pestis C092(MIC=500µg/ml),Brucella melitensis 16M(MIC=500µg/ml),Brucella abortus 2308(MIC=500µg/ml),Francisella tularensis(MIC=250µg/ml),Burkholderia mallei(MIC=500µg/ml),Burkholderia pseudomallei(MIC=500µg/ml)
